name: NiceDeal Enterprises
overview:
“Nice Deal Enterprises Private Limited,” is successfully ranked amongst the top manufacturer a n d supplier of world class array of Festival Gifts, Promotional Pens, Table Clock, Digital Photo Frame, Momentos, Desktop Calendar, Pocket Diary, Pen Drive, Calculator, DVD/VCD Player, Camera, IPOD, Digital Printing Bags, Passport Holder, Key Ring, Organizers , etc.

Our Clients: Sony Herblife KSJ Techno Services Pvt. Ltd. SRF Limited Jubilant Lifescinces Ltd.

Our Quality Assurance: Being a quality-oriented firm, we ensure that all the products are delivered to the clients as per the international standards. We direct all our efforts towards providing superior quality Corporate Gifts, Promotional Gifts, Diary, Calenders to our esteemed clients.

Client Satisfaction: Owing to our world class Corporate Gifts and Promotional Gifts, competitive pricing policy and wide distribution network; we have increased our client base in different sectors of the industry. We provide these products in both standard and customized forms as per our clients’ specified specifications.

Why Us ?: We are successfully ranked amongst the top manufacturer and supplier of high quality Corporate Gifts, Promotional Gifts, Diary, Calenders. In addition to this, we are also engaged in providing Printing Services to our esteemed clients.
